#1 Ranking in Global Custodian's Annual Survey Goes to Clear Street
NEW YORK – December 23, 2024
Clear Street

, (“Clear Street”, “the Company”) a cloud-native financial technology firm on a mission to modernize the brokerage ecosystem, commented today on recent industry-wide recognition for top awards in technology and client service, and its #1 ranking in Global Custodian’s 2024 Prime Brokerage Survey.

In the fourth quarter of 2024, at the annual Global Custodian Industry Leaders Awards, which celebrates excellence across the securities services industry, Clear Street won leading positions in two critical categories:Technology & Client Service. Clear Street also ranked as the #1 Prime Broker Overall in Global Custodian's 2024 Prime Brokerage Survey, where the Company achieved an exceptional rating of 6.52 out of 7.0, significantly exceeding the global peer average of 5.77. Clear Street secured top positions in the survey across multiple critical service categories including Technology, Client Service, Trading and Execution, Stock Borrowing and Lending and also in Fixed Income, where the firm received a perfect score of 7.0.

Ed Tilly, President and CEO-Elect of Clear Street said, "These awards and ranking further validate our tech-enabled mission to modernize the brokerage ecosystem. Clear Street puts the client at the center of everything we do, and our cloud-native technology supports them with real-time data and best-in-class products and services. We are delighted and honored to be recognized as the #1 Prime Broker Overall and as a leader across Technology and Client Service, and it is particularly thrilling given that we are amongst so many respected and well-established institutions considered for these accolades.”
For more information about Clear Street's prime brokerage services, visit
https://www.clearstreet.io/
